UPDATE_COMPANY - Static variable in class DAO.CompanySQLQueries

updateCompany(Company) - Method in class businessLogic.AdminFacade
Update company in the table Company - Can't update company if the company NOT found
- Can't update company if the name changed
- Can't update company if the system shut down
updateCompany(Company) - Method in interface DAO.CompanyDAO
Update company in the table Company
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class DAO.CompanyDBDAO
Update company in the table Company
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class businessLogic.CompanyFacade
Update coupon in the table Coupon - Can't update coupon if the coupon NOT found
- Can update only the end date and the price
- Can't update coupon if the system shut down
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface DAO.CouponDAO
Update coupon in the table Coupon
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class DAO.CouponDBDAO
Update coupon in the table Coupon
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class businessLogic.AdminFacade
Update customer in the table Customer - Can't update customer if the customer NOT found
- Can't update customer if the name changed
- Can't update customer if the system shut down
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface DAO.CustomerDAO
Update customer in the table Customer
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class DAO.CustomerDBDAO
